Topic.Title: How do you put multiple links to the same page? [SOLVED]

Posts.EditableText: I am new to QUEST , sorry if it seems noobish. I happen to not know how to put multiple links that direct to the same page.
Posts.HTML: I am new to QUEST , sorry if it seems noobish. I happen to not know how to put multiple links that direct to the same page.

Posts.EditableText:
I don't think you can... using game book.
But you can if you use Text Adventure.
Text adventure is just a little bit more advanced, but does everything game book does.
(There just called rooms instead of pages.)
Posts.HTML:
I don't think you can... using game book.
But you can if you use Text Adventure.
Text adventure is just a little bit more advanced, but does everything game book does.
(There just called rooms instead of pages.)

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

Here's an example description I put on Page 1:

```
This is page 1. Type a description here, and then create links to other pages below.

{page:Page2:This is the new link that goes to page 2}
```

---
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/29838133-e90ff0ea-8cbf-11e7-84d9-1014839455c0.png)



---
>{page:command}
As command (an alternative name that may be prefered for game books).
>
>{page:command:text}
As command (an alternative name that may be prefered for game books).

[Source: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/text_processor.html](http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/text_processor.html "Click here to read the documentation on the text processor")
Posts.HTML:
Hello!

Here's an example description I put on Page 1:

This is page 1. Type a description here, and then create links to other pages below.

{page:Page2:This is the new link that goes to page 2}

{page:command}
As command (an alternative name that may be prefered for game books).

{page:command:text}
As command (an alternative name that may be prefered for game books).

Source: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/text_processor.html
